name: TD Hero Tactics (TFT, Tower Defense, Auto Battler)
name_original: TD Hero Tactics (TFT, Tower Defense, Auto Battler)
description:
Auto battler

TFT inspired team composition. Different heroes have different abilities affecting themselves or nearby allies. Choose wisely where to place which hero.

Tower Defence

buy heroes, merge them, compose the team that can beat incomming waves of enemies to protect your base.

Merging / Evolving

merge two heroes to create one, higher tier hero with unique abilities.

Upgrading

choose which class of a heroes you want make stronger, faster or more durable.
